sub_title: Freelance Information Security Officer for Ricochet Dynamics B.V.
summary:
22+ years of IT experience including 15+ years of broad based IT and security management. Strategically and cost effectively utilizes technology in alignment with corporate goals. Consistently improve delivery times and service levels whilst reducing costs. Excels in strategic planning, building high performance teams, project management, and implementing best practice methodologies and continuous improvement programs. Certified as CISSP, CISA, CRISC, C|EH and ISO 27001 lead auditor. Experience with ITIL, COBIT and PCI DSS.

Specialties: Strategic and Business Planning
Organizational Development
Budget Development & Management
Contract Negotiations
Cost Containment
Infrastructure Design & Implementation
Information Security
Process Improvements & Best Practices
Project Management
Continuous Improvement
Large Scale Deployments
System Architectures
Rapid Deployments
Data Centre Management
Change Management

Key tool is Forensic Tool Kit (FTK) and integrating the Operations IT Security in to an ITIL based service delivery department.', 'title': 'Senior Manager Operations Security', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 26726, 'name': 'Arcapita Bank B.S.C.(c)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGEjAXbWvcoJA/company-logo_400_400/0/1647778788973?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wJQhbbTlSiEwBtNKX7yCM1VbMhvRowgPko7wmh4ZMLA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/arcapita/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Manama, Bahrain', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'Arcapita', 'description': 'Managed all aspects of physical security of the global Arcapita Offices (Bahrain, United States, United Kingdom and later Singapore).

With the relocation of the company to the new Arcapita Headquarters the physical security team of 21 staff consisting of a combination of Arcapita staff and contracted security guards were under my guidance and supervision. I was also involved in designing the state-of-the-art security features of the new headquarters.', 'title': 'Chief Security Officer (CSO), Principal', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Manama, Bahrain', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}}, 'company': 'Arcapita', 'description': 'As Information Security Officer (ISO) , a  position which covered all Arcapita Offices (Bahrain, United States & United Kingdom) my objective was to get the company certified for the BS 17799. This BS 17799 certification was skipped when the ISO 27001 certification became available.

My scope included chairing a security committee, risk analysis and management, documentation management and controls, information access controls, ensuring regulatory compliance, developing security policies and procedures, participating in internal audits, developing a Business Continuity Plan (BCP) including an extensive Disaster Recovery procedure, change/configuration management, security incident management, IT investigations, testing of security procedures, mechanisms and measures, developing and delivering a security awareness training program', 'title': 'Information Security Officer, Associate', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Manama, Bahrain', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}}, 'company': 'Arcapita', 'description': 'Initially recruited to manage the Bahrain HQ and the US office in Atlanta (named Crescent Capital Inc.). My responsibilities included, but were not limited to, the fields of Networking; Desktop; Servers; Security; Telephony; Firewalls; Disaster Recovery; Email (Lotus), etc. 

In 2002 Arcapita opened a subsidiary office under the name of Crescent Capital Ltd. in London, which I managed all of the IT requirements and staff in addition to the Bahrain HQ and Atlanta office. I was also responsible for the yearly evaluation of the IT team and their training plan.

By 2004 I was responsible for managing the technical rebranding of the company from First Islamic Investment Bank to Arcapita and also the technical sounding board for all staff.', 'title': 'Technical IT Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 2305605, 'name': 'Batelco', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHYjki2UD99nA/company-logo_400_400/0/1659854642156?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=JJpmpYAuhfYHKktBhWoI6N5xfJDGUdOGxwrdh-Ln4DA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/batelco/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 1998}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Manama, Bahrain', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 1998}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}}, 'company': 'Batelco', 'description': 'Initially recruited as an analyst in the Desktop section my first assignment was to research 32 bit emulators for mainframe and Unix access. After presenting the results to the management and upon my recommendations Reflections was purchased. 

Due to my experience and advanced messaging skills I was promoted to the E-Mail section and became a team leader as E-Mail System Coordinator.  I also managed numerous enhancements and acted as 3rd line support for the system

Projects included:
-Designing Lotus Notes/Domino infrastructure.
-Installing, fine tuning and administering Windows NT 4.0 SP 5 for Lotus Notes /Domino environment.
-Migrating 1600 staff from cc:Mail to Lotus Notes.', 'title': 'Team Manager Internal E-Mail', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Ministry of State', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 1998}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Manama, Bahrain', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 1998}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}}, 'company': 'Ministry of State', 'description': 'Due to my high understanding of IT matters and the strict confidentiality and sensitivity of the work within the Ministry of State (State of Bahrain) I replaced their contracted IT support company and I was contracted as the primary IT support on a freelance basis.
